â”‚ When `ait switch` runs:                                     â”‚
â”‚ 1. Profile switches (colors, fonts)                         â”‚
â”‚ 2. Tab title updates (project name + branch)                â”‚
â”‚ 3. Badge updates (context icon)                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. Status bar variables set                                 â”‚

â”‚   src/aiterm/context/detector.py                            â”‚
â”‚                                                             â”‚
â”‚ Add new type:                                               â”‚
â”‚   1. Add ContextType enum value                             â”‚
â”‚   2. Add detection logic in detect_context()                â”‚
â”‚   3. Map to profile in CONTEXT_PROFILES                     â”‚
